title: Surety bonds and performance guarantees
dataVerified: Contractor name, project name/location, bond number, bond amount, surety company, issue date, expiration date
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Bond cancellation date (if cancelled). Claim filed date (if claim exists). Link to surety company verification system (project owners and regulatory authorities only, requires login)
rationale: Owners verify bond authenticity instantly at bid opening or project start. Prevents fake bonds in construction and contracting. Domain binding verifies legitimate surety companies. High-value projects require instant verification without delay.
